_meta.description: Task difficulty scores for computing weighted avg_difficulty metric

scoring_guidelines.0.4-0.6: Standard tasks with clear criteria (e.g., process cancellation, calculate refund)
scoring_guidelines.0.6-0.8: Multi-step tasks requiring judgment (e.g., handle exception request with documentation)
scoring_guidelines.0.8-1.0: Complex nuance scenarios (e.g., balance host preferences with guest needs)

vacation_rental_notes.0-6: Basic cancellation policy lookup and refund calculation tasks
vacation_rental_notes.7-12: Multi-step cancellation scenarios with grace periods and calculations
vacation_rental_notes.13-21: Tool validation scenarios - simple tool invocation tests
vacation_rental_notes.22-23: Full nuance scenarios testing host-guest interaction complexity
